metadata.synopsis: Bex is happy or sad, depending on the survival of Danis

0.speaker: Bex
0.text: Your face... your face is familiar. But it isn't Danis' face. His is the only face I want to see, and I... I'll never see it again.

1.speaker: Bex
1.text: We made it through Hell - twice! I know now that as long as Danis and I stick together, we can do anything.
